example[0]: Most of us are more productive in the morning.
definition[1]: relating to the production of goods, crops, or wealth
example[3]: The program is designed to help business users be more productive.
example[4]: We want to turn welfare recipients into productive, working members of society.
example[5]: The plant has the newest and most productive steel-making technology.
example[6]: The strike is cutting deeper into the company’s productive capacity (=ability to produce things).
